document.full_text: former president jimmy carter met with leading cuban dissidents on wednesday and told them he expected to visit imprisoned u.s. aid contractor alan gross before leaving the communist-ruled island.
document.title: carter meets cuba dissidents, to visit jailed u.s. man
lines_and_colors: former president jimmy carter met with leading cuban dissidents on wednesday and told them he expected to visit imprisoned u.s. aid contractor alan gross before leaving the communist-ruled island.
